00001 #include "db.h"

00003 DataBase::DataBase(){

00007 bool DataBase::checkDb(QStringList tables){
00008    /*
00009     * Checking database tables.
00010     * If not exists, we try to create them.
00011     */
00012 
00013    QSqlDatabase db = QSqlDatabase::database();
00014    QSqlQuery query;
00015    QString table="";
00016 
00017    for (int i=0; i<tables.size(); ++i){
00018     table=tables.at(i).toLocal8Bit().constData();
00019 
00020     if (db.record(table).isEmpty()){
00021        if (table == "prefix"){
00022         if(!query.exec("CREATE TABLE prefix (wine_dllpath TEXT, wine_loader TEXT, wine_server TEXT, wine_exec TEXT, cdrom_mount TEXT, cdrom_drive TEXT, id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, path TEXT, version TEXT);"))
00023            return FALSE;
00024 
00025            //Creating default prefix reccord
00026            query.prepare("INSERT INTO prefix(id, name) VALUES(NULL, :name);");
00027            query.bindValue(":name", "Default");
00028            if (!query.exec())
00029             return FALSE;
00030            query.clear();
00031        }
00032        if (table == "dir"){
00033         if(!query.exec("CREATE TABLE dir (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, prefix_id NUMERIC);"))
00034            return FALSE;
00035        }
00036        if (table == "icon"){
00037         if(!query.exec("CREATE TABLE icon (wrkdir TEXT, override TEXT, winedebug TEXT, useconsole NUMERIC, display TEXT, cmdargs TEXT, exec TEXT, icon_path TEXT, desc TEXT, desktop TEXT, nice TEXT, dir_id NUMERIC, id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, prefix_id NUMERIC);"))
00038            return FALSE;
00039        }
00040        if (table == "images"){
00041         if(!query.exec("CREATE TABLE images (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, path TEXT);"))
00042            return FALSE;
00043        }
00044     }
00045    }
00046 
00047    return TRUE;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void DataBase::close(){
00051    QSqlDatabase db = QSqlDatabase::database();
00052    db.close();
00053    return;
00054 }
